title: AI Sales Development Rep (SDR)
subtitle: Automate prospecting, qualification, and outreach to fill your pipeline 24/7
description: Deploy an AI-powered SDR that identifies high-quality leads, personalizes outreach at scale, and books qualified meetings while your human team focuses on closing deals.

benefits.title: 24/7 Lead Qualification
benefits.description: AI analyzes incoming leads against your ICP criteria, scores them automatically, and routes qualified prospects to the right sales rep instantly.

benefits.title: Personalized Outreach at Scale
benefits.description: Generate custom email sequences, LinkedIn messages, and follow-ups tailored to each prospect's industry, pain points, and behavior.

benefits.title: Intelligent Meeting Booking
benefits.description: Automatically schedule discovery calls with qualified leads, sync calendars, send reminders, and handle rescheduling requests.

benefits.title: CRM Auto-Sync
benefits.description: Every interaction, email open, link click, and meeting is logged to your CRM with zero manual data entry required.

features.title: Lead Enrichment & Scoring
features.description: Automatically research prospects using LinkedIn, company websites, and databases to build rich profiles and assign priority scores.

features.title: Multi-Channel Sequences
features.description: Orchestrate email, LinkedIn, and SMS touchpoints with AI-optimized timing and personalization based on engagement data.

features.title: Smart Calendar Management
features.description: Handle booking, rescheduling, and cancellations while respecting rep availability and time zones across global teams.

features.title: Performance Analytics
features.description: Track open rates, response rates, meetings booked, and conversion metrics with real-time dashboards and insights.

features.title: Instant Follow-Ups
features.description: Trigger contextual follow-ups within minutes of prospect actions like email opens, website visits, or content downloads.

features.title: Territory Management
features.description: Automatically assign leads to reps based on geography, industry, company size, or custom routing rules you define.

useCases.title: Inbound Lead Qualification
useCases.description: AI SDR evaluates form submissions, asks qualifying questions via email, and books meetings only with leads that match your criteriaâ€”filtering out tire-kickers automatically.

useCases.title: Outbound Prospecting
useCases.description: Upload target account lists and let AI research contacts, craft personalized outreach, and nurture prospects through multi-touch sequences until they respond or book a call.

useCases.title: Event Follow-Up
useCases.description: After conferences or webinars, AI SDR sends personalized follow-ups to attendees, segments by engagement level, and schedules demos with hot prospects.

metrics.speed: Respond to inbound leads in under 60 seconds
